nodes.text: Fellon's marina was a marina located in the city of Fellon on the planet of Halmad.

In 7 ABY, it was strafed by TIE Fighters flown by pilots of Wraith Squadron, who at that time were pretending to be the pirate group Hawk-bat Independent Space Force. The attack caused millions of credits in damages as estimated by Wraith pilot Kell Tainer.
